price: 8. ceux-là auront le Feu pour refuge, comme prix des œuvres qu’ils auront acquises.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
